properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 10 at 4:35AM EST until January 12 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, waves 3 to 6 feet
occurring. For the Gale Watch, northeast winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and waves 4 to 7 feet possible.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM EST this
morning. For the Gale Watch, from Saturday afternoon through
late Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT
